short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Clear browser data without going to browser settings. Choose what and since when to obliterate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to choose and clear all sort of browser data in one click. It also lets you choose the time since when the data should be deleted. 

✔ Clear all kind of browser data from one place in one click.
✔ Choose what to clear.
✔ Choose since when to clear the data.
✔ Shows progress (animated loader) while clearing data.
✔ Shows success message after clearing data.
✔ Developed using angularJS.
